articles.title: London loses position as most valuable European stock market - BBC
articles.description: Paris is now Europe's biggest stock market, overtaking London for the first time since records began in 2003.
articles.content:
Britain's stock market has lost its position as Europe's most-valued, with France taking the top spot, data shows.
A weak pound, fears of recession in the UK and surging sales at French luxury goods… [+3605 chars]
